title: Looking for a duo ADC or Support partner for ranked!
body:
Hi,

I am a recently demoted S3 ADC/Support main.  I am wanting to get to Gold rank before end of season due to Sivir being one of the main ADC characters I use. I am looking for a duo partner around the same rank as me that knows the ADC or Support role very well, so that we can grind up to gold. 
Add Aquamarie in game if interested.
